items.title: Save $400 today on Lenovo’s touchscreen Yoga 7i 2-in-1 Copilot+ PC while it’s down to $500 all-time low
items.summary:
As part of its now live Last Minute Doorbusters, Best Buy is offering Lenovo’s Yoga 7i 16-inch 2-in-1 Copilot+ PC for $499.99 shipped. This Intel-powered laptop typically goes for $900, so you’re looking at a straight-up $400 discount on it right now. The 14-inch variant of this notebook saw a $400 discount earlier this year during the retailer’s Labor Day sale, but this is the first time we’re seeing this 16-inch model drop this low. Lenovo, in case you’re wondering, has the same laptop currently listed at $529.99 shipped, making Best Buy’s offer a touch better with an additional $30 discount. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Originally $150 Logitech G PRO X SUPERLIGHT wireless gaming mouse now at $80 with Christmas delivery
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s G PRO X SUPERLIGHT gaming mouse in black down to $79.99 shipped. This is originally a $150 model that has fetched as much as $110 in recent months at Amazon. Today’s deal delivers a 47% markdown on its original price, shaving $30 off its usual going rate. This is the lowest price we’ve tracked for it this year, outside of a very brief drop to $50 earlier in January that only a few managed to snag. It remains a solid pick if you’re looking to buy a new mouse for your battlestation or as a gift for the holidays – especially at its discounted price today with Christmas delivery – and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.title: Pennsylvania's Supreme Court rules that police can get Google search data without a warrant; an expert warns it may encourage warrantless searches nationwide (Suzanne Smalley/The Record)
items.summary:
Suzanne Smalley / The Record:
Pennsylvania's Supreme Court rules that police can get Google search data without a warrant; an expert warns it may encourage warrantless searches nationwide  —  The Pennsylvania Supreme Court ruled Tuesday that police did not need a warrant to obtain a convicted rapist's Google searches when investigating the crime.

Normally fetching $550 at full price, this all-encompassing package has mostly been dropping its costs to $440 over the year, with some more recent drops to $400, and one-time drops to $390 and a $380 low peppered in. You can pick it up for your home upgrades here at the next-best price from those one-time discounts lower, complete with $150 savings. There’s also the larger multi-cam kits for this model on the same page starting from $459.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page coupons.

That said, it is made by iOttie and boasts a built-in carabiner which is a feature that we don’t see very common.
